name: h3
description: Elevate your game with the 2026 DeMarini CF Drop 10 Fastpitch Softball Bat, engineered for peak performance with its Paraflex™ Plus Composite Barrel. This bat is a favorite among top high school and college athletes for its dependable barrel performance straight out of the wrapper, allowing players to connect with more pitches effortlessly. Its Type-V™ Connection minimizes hand-stinging vibrations, delivering a responsive feel that enhances your clutch hits. Certified by USSSA, USA Softball (ASA), NSA, ISA, and WBSC, this balanced bat boasts a striking white, pink, and purple colorway, ensuring both style and substance on the field. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included.
